author: Maksym Kuziava
comment: Any chance to get it updated to support Wear 2.0 features (e.g. gestures, scrolling with wheel to switch between tasks)? Also would be perfect to see several tasks on the screen (use available space more effectively). Watch: LG Watch Style  UPD Also the app hangs loading tasks from the phone. Sometimes it takes 10 sec, but usually more than a minute.  Impossible to use. As Wear app is critical in my ecosystem, going to unsubscribe from ticktick and move task management to google keep

author: Felipe Castillo
comment: The first time I opened, I try adding a task but nothing happened. I gave up, and when trying to open the app again it just got stuck in "loading". I realized that the app doesn't work when the watch is only on wifi mode, this app needs bluetooth or it won't work. I'm tried everything and adding a task doesn't work no matter what.

author: Rajeev Mehra
comment: 1. Gets stuck on "loading..." on my Huawei watch most of the time. Pleas fix! 2. On the times it does work, it shows only one task on the whole screen at one time. The photos/screenshots here show multiple tasks with checkboxes on the left side. How do I get that?

author: Joseph Yeung
comment: It kept saying loading. Not working at all.  Thanks to Felipe I turned off WiFi mode and it works now. Add 1 more star to 2. Hope they fix this issue soon.
title: Zenwatch 2

author: Bob Schmerda
comment: Uninstalled it fastest than any application I've gotten from a long-trusted source development company.  You guys need a new Wear developer?  I'm more than ready to take this on!  Because very sadly, you are greatly missing out market-share in the Wearables-world (yes there is indeed) and likely missing out in mobile to-do lists altogether.  I just could cancel long-time TickTick, and either write my own, or Google Keep (that works okay on watch/every platform), or explore alternatives.  This is serious oversight to ignore timeframe of Dec. 2015 to today, March 2017 of released/purchased watches, and useless Wear app for TickTick.  So what do you say? Need a  Wear developer to untangle this mess?

author: Michaela Frösing
comment: Stuck on loading, sometimes til it crashes. I couldn't get notifications at all. Now partly solved after a reinstall on Android wear app on my op3. But can't get the notification with sound on my watch, even if I choose only make sound on Huawei watch while wearing it, a setting in the android wear app. Please solve this! Especially the crash issue. However I do love the platform, the possibility and options t brings me and that finally someone made an app that takes on Android wear and all. When isse s fixed it will be the greatest! 🙌 Am changing to a 5 star whenever that happens, promise

author: Alex Lavrov
comment: For those who have problems, you have to install "tick tick - to do & task list" on your phone  in order for  this app to work on your watch.
title: Works great

author: Madhu Nair
comment: Its getting stuck on loading in my Huawei watch. And once I think it has loaded, I am not getting any notifications or view of my tasks. I looked at the comments on Google Play for TickTick Wear, this has been the problem since last year. How soon will this be fixed?

author: Rasmus Schøler Sørensen
comment: Would be great if it actually worked. Of the four options in "List to show in Android Wear", only "Today" and "Inbox" works for items not in the inbox. "Next 7 days" and "All" will not show anything except the "Add task" icon. Also, no updates since 2015? (the calendar reads 2017 when this review is written..)

author: Jennifer Franco
comment: This app does not open on my watch.  It just says loading.  Very disappointed, I was excited to integrate ticktick on my watch.
title: Does not work

author: John Mierau
comment: Wanted it to work. It so doesn't.
title: Pretty terrible

author: Yggua Zoid
comment: I'm extremely glad you have an fullfeatured wear app! But I really miss a notifications on my watch that would remind me about my tasks due dates.
title: Cool

author: Glenn Wakefield
comment: Tries to start and the wheel just spins and states it's loading.
title: Doesn't work on Moto 360

author: Brent Goldspring
comment: Doesn't support Wear 2.0 and frankly just doesn't work. Disappointing considering this is an otherwise amazing todo list app.

author: Alan Pierson
comment: Two long-standing issues that have persisted despite many complaints: 1) trying to look at my todo list on Android Wear seldom works; 2) some (but not all) tasks change due dates when I switch time zones, which is never something I want to happen.
title: Frustrating!!!

author: Dave Furey
comment: Doesn't work on my Galaxy S8. The app just shows "loading" and nothing happens. Very disappointed.

author: Douglas Ho
comment: Not work with my Hong Kong/China Huawei Watch 2

author: Graham Nind
comment: Works really well. If I didn't need to keep notification icon visible on my phone it would be perfect.
title: Fantastic app

author: b byrd
comment: I hate this app it takes so long to load

author: Bambino Kitten
comment: Wont even open. I have this on my Chromebook and LOVE  IT. I was so excited for it. HUGE disappointment.
title: 😡😡😡

author: Kevin Aguilar
comment: (Zenwatch 2) the app works great, snappy and responsive, also, the cards look beautiful with the combination of accent colors and illustrations.
title: Great addition.

author: Tim Fowkes
comment: Thought this was Tick Tick. Says it's installed but does not show up on my device, will not launch.
title: Wtf is this

author: Dan Wampler
comment: LH Sport 2 - loaded for Wear and won't get passed "Loading". What do I do?

author: Manh DN
comment: None of update for years. We really need this since Wear is becoming popular. Make it usable pls

author: Gerard Palma
comment: So what's the point
title: Does not sync with phone

author: Moko Chang
comment: Keeps Crashing :(
title: Crashing

author: Hans Zhang
comment: Can't receive notification on my watch

author: Tech Coolness
comment: Stuck on "loading..."

author: Ivan Nikolov
comment: Hangs on synchronization...

author: mahdi chaparian
comment: Thank you

author: Nelly
comment: Awesomeness!

author: javad vafaei
comment: Nice

author: Karen Carter
comment: Was really happy to find this. Installed,won't work, either keeps loading or states disconnection error. Uninstalling
title: Not working

author: Niraj Shah
comment: This is the only Todo app to still be on my phone after a year. Does the job and does it well. It's a shame that the Wear version isn't better.
title: Poor wear version

author: Will Whitworth
comment: I'm not getting any notifications on my Android Wear watch when I have a task due. I am able to manually load the app on the phone and view them. Is this a bug?
title: No notifications

author: Vinod Kisanagaram
comment: Not receiving notifications for LG Urbane
title: Excellent Mobile App But Poor Wear App

author: Frank Merenda
comment: Get this app! I can finally manage my tasks efficiently! Google now integration,  wear app makes it even easier to use!
title: Finally!

author: Andrey Neyman
comment: Your phone app is awesome. But why did you make that weird restriction with due date? I've never used it and wear app is absolutely useless for me. I can't even see my shopping list. I hope you will reconsider and expand app aims.
title: Only today's tasks

author: Vani Monkeybear
comment: Unfortunately only the tasks due the same day will show on Android wear. I hope they'll fix this thing because I'd like to be able to access all my tasks/lists anytime!!! Other than that, really good app
title: For all those who don't see any tasks showing up on their watch

author: Ben Sumner
comment: The competition is scarce, so this is the best todo app for wear. But it has flaws. You can only browse tasks that have a due date of today, which is ridiculous.
title: The best todo app for wear, but not good.
